title: Leiah a lo piang van Lalbera chu
lyrics:
Leiah a lo piang van Lalbera chu,
Angel-in an chawimawi lawm hla ropui takin.
Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Lei mihring tan remna leng se, an ti.

Aw van angel-ho zai rite chuan,
Bethlehem dai a nghawr vel e,
An lawm hla ri zam velte chuan,
"Imanuela, Lal, Chungnung ber rawh se" an ti.

Remna Lal thianghlim ber chu a piang ta,
Davida thlah arsi eng mawi chatuan ata;
Kum khuain a lal reng ang a,
A hming ropui chatuain an fak ang.

Aw, angel-te chu lo zai nawn leh se,
Bethlehem dai hmun khawhara ka awm lai hian;
An ri mawi leh an thawmte chu,
Kan thinlungah kumkhuain cham rawh se.
